quote: It had taken her a good deal of time before she believed that she was worth all that fierce affection he lavished upon her. To have it stolen away unjustly was that much more cruel.
quote_letters: IT HAD TAKEN HER A GOOD DEAL OF TIME BEFORE SHE BELIEVED THAT SHE WAS WORTH ALL THAT FIERCE AFFECTION HE LAVISHED UPON HER TO HAVE IT STOLEN AWAY UNJUSTLY WAS THAT MUCH MORE CRUEL
